Sentencas: LSM (lanthanum strontium manganite) thin films were deposited by sol-gel/dip coating on metallic substrate (SS439 - Cr 16.6%) aiming the application in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters

Sentencas: The gels were prepared with different ratios of organic/metal salt concentration and viscosities.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters

Sentencas: LSM films were deposited on alloy substrate with varying number of layers (1, 2 and 3) and annealed at temperatures of 600-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters

Sentencas: The films were characterized by X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy to study the influence of the deposition parameters on the structure and morphology of the films.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters

Sentencas: The LSM films deposited with lower viscosity exhibited better adhesion to the substrate with good homogeneity.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters

Sentencas: The sample prepared with gel viscosity of 50 mPa.s and one deposited layer presented pure crystalline phase, crack-free surface and a more homogeneous coating.
Titulo: Synthesis of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films supported on Fe-Cr alloy by sol-gel/dip-coating process: Evaluation of deposition parameters
